name: Sarah Chen
content: RoleRaise helped me go from $120K to $280K in just 3 months. The mentorship and interview prep were incredible!

name: Mike Rodriguez
content: The system design training was exceptional. I went from failing interviews to landing a PM role at Meta with a $220K offer.

name: Emily Johnson
content: The personalized mentorship made all the difference. My mentor helped me negotiate a $250K package at Amazon!

name: David Park
content: From startup to FAANG - RoleRaise made the impossible possible. The networking and mentorship were game-changing.

name: Jessica Liu
content: The technical interview prep was incredibly thorough. I felt completely prepared for Apple's rigorous process.

name: Carlos Martinez
content: RoleRaise helped me transition from agency work to Big Tech. The portfolio review and design system training were invaluable.
